Package dao

Interface AppointmentDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppointmentDaoImpl
    public interface AppointmentDao
    Dao interface for Appointment.
    Author:
    Charles Plett

    • Method Detail

      • getAppointment

        Appointment getAppointment​(int id)
        Gets the Appointment associated with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Appointment to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The Appointment requested or null if no Appointment is found.

      • getUpcomingAppointment

        Appointment getUpcomingAppointment​(int userId)
        Gets the next upcoming appointment associated with the given userId.
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId to get the next appointment for.
        Returns:
        Returns the Appointment requested, or null if there are no appointments in the next 15 minutes.

      • getCustomerAppointments

        javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCustomerAppointments​(int id)
        Gets all appointments associated with customer.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the customer to get appointments for.
        Returns:
        Returns an ObservableList of Appointments for the given customer.

      • getAllAppointments

        javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
        Gets all Appointments.
        Returns:
        Returns an ObservableList of all Appointments.

      • getWeekAppointments

        javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getWeekAppointments()
        Gets all appointments within 7 days of the current day.
        Returns:
        Returns an ObservableList of all Appointments requested.

      • getMonthAppointments

        javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonthAppointments()
        Gets all appointments within 31 days of the current day.
        Returns:
        Returns an ObservableList of all Appointments requested.

      • isOverlappingAppointment

        boolean isOverlappingAppointment​(int customerId,
                                 Instant start,
                                 Instant end,
                                 int appointmentId)
        Checks if the times would overlap with an existing appointment for this customer.
        Parameters:
        customerId - The id of the customer to check.
        start - The start time of the prospective appointment.
        end - The end time of the prospective appointment.
        appointmentId - The id of the prospective appointment to check.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the appointment times overlaps. Else returns false.

      • getAppointmentReportByTypeAndMonth

        String getAppointmentReportByTypeAndMonth()
        Generates a report with the total number of customer appointments by type and month.
        Returns:
        Returns String with the report.

      • getAppointmentReportByContact

        String getAppointmentReportByContact()
        Generates a report with Schedule of each contact. Includes appointmentId, Title, type, description, start date and time, end date and time and customerID.
        Returns:
        Returns a String with the report.

      • getAppointmentReportByCustomer

        String getAppointmentReportByCustomer()
        Generates a report with the schedule of each customer.
        Returns:
        Returns a String with the report.

      • createAppointment

        void createAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
        Saves an appointment to the database.
        Parameters:
        appointment - The appointment to save.

      • updateAppointment

        void updateAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
        Updates an appointment in the database.
        Parameters:
        appointment - The appointment to update.

      • deleteAppointment

        void deleteAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
        Deletes an appointment from the database.
        Parameters:
        appointment - The appointment to delete.
